messages.subject: Re: More about "When kids push your buttons"
messages.msgSnippet: Hello all, I am new to this but am so grateful and relieved for the choice we have made to unschool our boys, 7 and 3. We have come up against alot of
messages.messageBody:
Hello all,
I am new to this but am so grateful and relieved for
the choice we have made to unschool our boys, 7 and 3.
We have come up against alot of opposition...more on
that at another time, but I KNOW in my heart what is
right.
Speaking of parenting methods: I got the 1-2-3 magic
program about a year and 1/2 ago. We tried it. It
sucked. I am so glad to finally find people who "get"
my methods. I did not have a name or label for it,
but I am now at least able to be a part of a community
of free thinking people. Thanks for letting me be a
part.
Heather
